page.title: 01BACKWELL AND FLAX BOURTON
page.content: The area in question consists of the villages of Backwell and Flax Bourton.It is bisected by the A370 road which links Bristol to the motorway network and the main Bristol to Exeter railway line.Both are dormitory villages for the city of Bristol since there is only a small amount of light industry and the local shops to provide employment. The surrounding countryside is fertile farmland. During the last twenty years there has been a great deal of expansion but now land for building is at a premium and further expansion in both villages is the subject of forceful debate. The links between the villages are strengthened by the children from Flax Bourton going to Backwell for their secondary education.
